entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
